img.alt: 2020-2021 Regular open enrollment application period extended

div.h3: The 2020-2021 Regular Open Enrollment Application Period Extended
div.p:
The 2020-2021 regular open enrollment application period has been extended. The new deadline to apply by is May 29, 2020 at 4:00p.m.
Please check DPI's website for more information: https://dpi.wi.gov/open-enrollment

a.span: Read more on The 2020-2021 Regular Open Enrollment Application Period Extended
